title: Talking Larry the Bird v3.0 [Paid] [APK]
description:
Description:
WHISTLE, SING and FLYÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ Meet Talking Larry the Bird, your very own singing, feathered friend.

Unleash your inner musician by making Larry whistle along to everything you play Ã¢â‚¬â€œ and share your amazing songs on Facebook or YouTube!


Features:
- Talk to Larry: Speak and he repeats what you say in his own hilarious voice. 
- Play with Larry: Stroke him, poke him and see what happens. 
- Feed Larry: Give him seeds and watch him peck!
- Explore the fun actions: Hit Larry with a bolt of lightning or make him take a bow.
- Become a musician: Use the piano keys to make Larry whistle any song you play.
- Record videos and share: Record videos of all the fun things Larry does to send to your friends, or upload on Facebook and YouTube.


What's New:
We fine-tuned the piano, polished his bowl and added fresh (bug free!) food.


Required Android O/S : Varies with device
